main.name: Patrick Goulding
main.description: Software Engineer based in Seattle, WA
main.bio: When I'm not making new recipes, hiking with my dog, or fiddling with hardware IOT devices, I create beautiful and accessible websites. Specializing in JavaScript, React and Node. I'm always open to learning new things and interesting challenges.
main.contactmessage: Contact me for contract opportunities or full time employment.

education.description: Turing School of Software and Design is an immersive training in fundamental web technologies. Web development with JavaScript, Professional Client-Side development, and desktop and mobile applications with web technologies.

education.school: Community College of the Air Force
education.description: The Electronics Systems Technology program teaches students to design and build electronic systems and learn about analog and digital electronics. They are able to apply the engineering and mathematical principles that they learn in order to implement and maintain electronic systems, such as computers and controllers.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Redesigned front and backend of legacy app built in Flash and PHP used for emergency school and 911 communications to utilize new technologies such as PostgreSQL, Node, React, and Redux.

work.title: Tech Analyst II
work.description: Worked at Saint David's Medical Center in downtown Austin until promotion and transfer to Heart Hospital of Austin, supporting the hospital's network infrastructure, systems administration as well as day to day problems with managing 1000+ desktops, laptops, cell phones, and other proprietary devices.

work.title: Radio Frequency Transmissions Specialist (3D1X3)
work.description: Worked on Radios, Sattelites and Antennas as a Ground Control Station maintenance technician for the remotely piloted aircraft such as the MQ-1 Predator and MQ-9 Reaper.

work.title: Network Administrator
work.description: Worked as a Network Administrator, overseeing a variety of day to day operations: including Cisco and Dell Network administration, Windows support and Help Desk, Hardware Repair, Cisco and Panasonic PBX Phone Configuration

work.title: Owner and web designer
work.description: Operated as a sole proprietorhip building websites, repairing computers, setting up home and office networks, and offering technical assistance with anything the customer needed.

work.title: Audio VIsual Technician - Network and Phones specialist
work.description: Contract work for building fully integrated smart homes in the Roaring Fork Valley. Setup networks, phones and home automation consoles.

work.title: Network Technician
work.description: Worked as a network technician building and troubleshooting networks to connect smart home devices such as lighting, media servers, phones, security cameras and computers.

work.title: Computer Repair Technician
work.description: Worked as a computer repair technician for a small reapir shop. Designed and setup company website, wrote script to enable easier remote troubleshooting of computers with VNC, performed antivirus cleanup, spyware removal and cleanups for client's computers

work.title: Computer Repair Technician
work.description: Refurbished older donated computers to be upcycled to low income families. Designed process for testing, formatting and reimaging computers, for entire shop.

work.title: Intern Netwroking/ISP support
work.description: First job in the Tech field, setup some long range wideband antennas, learned the basics of the OSI Model, TCP/IP whiles asking a LOT of questions.

projects.title: Palette Picker
projects.category: App to create a comlimentary color scheme and save to a database.

projects.title: NASA Pic of the day
projects.category: A simple site built with Vue for a challenge to learn and deploy a site in a new framework in a weekend.

projects.title: Compass Job Search
projects.category: Job search app for people who are considering different locations and gives detailed city info for that job.

projects.title: Light Side
projects.category: A Star Wars fan site where you can cross refernce all canon Star Wars data, save favorites and learn more about the star wars universe.
